price: 我确已使你们在大地上安居，并为你们在大地上设生活所需。你们很少感谢。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad makkannākum fī al-arḍi wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha qalīlan mā tashkurūna
